title: Denotification as Slum Rehabilitation Area: SRA on being satisfied that it is necessary so to do, or when directed by the State Govt, shall denotify the Slum Rehabilitation Area
clause_text: Denotification as Slum Rehabilitation Area: SRA on being satisfied that it is necessary so to do, or when directed by the State Govt, shall denotify the Slum Rehabilitation Area.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut:
